title: Death by a Thousand Cuts Pt. II with Jacob Gallagher
description:
Mr. Gallagher, tear down this paywall! We’re back in the thunderdome with Men's Fashion Editor at Off Duty for the Wall Street Journal, Jacob Gallagher, for the meat and potatoes portion of The Only Podcast That Matters™. Jimmy and Larry refuse to take their foot off the gas and are cruising through topics both big and small including, but not limited to: profiling the Throw Gang vs. WSJ readers, how to deal with hate mail, test driving berets, parallel pathing stories, new media KPIs, how to survive losing your job, the secret to getting street styled, coping with image issues as a jawnz enthusiast, menswear misconceptions, foundational advice for aspiring writers and much more.
 
For more Throwing Fits, check us out on Patreon: www.patreon.com/throwingfits
dc:creator: Throwing Fits
